title: shared
body: so guys i shared my e-mail userame password and he tolled me he knows my father and he wants it because he need it for something and i did believe him i dont know why but he did stole my acc my acc summ name is moverezan1223 if there is anything to help me withpls tell me itried to contact riot supp but they told me they need the store info wich i dont remember so i couldnt do anything

replies.body:
Other than reaching back out on your support ticket to further work with the account specialist you were assigned, there's nothing else that can be done about this. You'll need to do your best at providing the requested information so we can verify you as the account owner before we can release the account to you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
